title: Napoleone Bonaparte
actors: Jean-Pierre Aumont, Jeanne Boitel, Pierre Brasseur, Gianna Maria Canale, Pauline Carton, Jean Chevrier, Danielle Darrieux, Clément Duhour, Jacques Dumesnil, O.W. Fischer, Jean Gabin, Daniel Gélin, Cosetta Greco, Sacha Guitry, Madeleine Lebeau
description: From 1769 to 1821, Napoléon Bonaparte's life, loves and exceptional destiny but as seen through the eyes of Talleyrand, the cynic and ironic politician, who once was the Emperor of France's Minister of Foreign Affairs.

actors: Toshirô Mifune, Yôko Tsukasa, Akihiko Hirata, Kyôko Kagawa, Takashi Shimura, Setsuko Hara, Kumi Mizuno, Misa Uehara, Kinuyo Tanaka, Akira Kubo, Akira Takarada, Ganjirô Nakamura, Eijirô Tôno, Jun Tazaki, Ken'ichi Enomoto

title: El Cid
